Q-Materialise Documentation¶

Welcome to the documentation for Q‑Materialise, an enhanced Material Design stylesheet library for Qt applications. This project is a redesign of the original qt‑material library developed by the UN‑GCPDS team. Q‑Materialise retains the spirit of the original while offering a simplified API, better customisation and improved readability. This guide will walk you through installation, usage and customisation. If you’re new to the library we recommend starting with the Installation and Usage pages.
